text: Notwithstanding any provision of a District Retirement Program or any other law, rule, or regulation, the Trustee:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., ยง 1-763.1.

DC CODE ยง 1-805.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: Shall determine whether an individual is eligible to receive a Federal benefit payment under this chapter;
Shall determine the amount and form of an individual's Federal benefit payment under this chapter; and
May recoup or recover, or waive recoupment or recovery of, any amounts paid under this chapter as a result of errors or omissions by the Trustee, the District Government, or any other person.

subchapter.text: Determinations and Review of Eligibility and Payments; Information Sharing.

heading.catch_text: Determination of eligibility for and amount of Federal benefit payments made by Trustee.
